title: Fix site-wide Call Now/Call Us phone number and centralize tel: usage

requirements.summary: Set the centralized phone number so all tel: links dial +918824495515.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/config/contact.ts, contactConfig.phoneNumber is set to "+918824495515".
On the deployed site, tapping the Call Now/Call Us button opens the dialer with +918824495515 on mobile.

file_operations.description: Update contactConfig.phoneNumber to "+918824495515" and ensure the computed phoneUrl continues to generate "tel:+918824495515" at runtime.

requirements.summary: Remove any hard-coded phone/tel values and ensure all call CTAs use contactConfig.phoneUrl.
acceptanceCriteria: A code search of the frontend shows no other hard-coded tel: links or the old number "+971501234567".
The sticky call button (frontend/src/components/landing/StickyContactButtons.tsx) continues to use contactConfig.phoneUrl and dials +918824495515.

file_operations.description: Verify the sticky Call button href is sourced from contactConfig.phoneUrl (and not a hard-coded tel: link) and that it correctly dials +918824495515 after the contactConfig update.

Audit all phone/call CTAs (e.g., Contact section call button) to ensure they use contactConfig.phoneUrl only; remove/replace any hard-coded tel: links or references to the old number +971501234567 if present.
Audit header/mobile menu CTAs to ensure there are no hard-coded tel: links or embedded phone numbers; keep contact actions routed through centralized config (contactConfig.*) where applicable.

requirements.summary: Update the post-deploy smoke checklist to explicitly verify the call button opens the dialer with +918824495515 on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/scripts/post-deploy-smoke-check.md includes a step to tap the call button on mobile and confirm the dialer shows +918824495515.

file_operations.description: Add/refresh the Call Now/Call Us mobile verification step to explicitly confirm that tapping the Call button opens the device dialer showing +918824495515 (not just that a call is initiated).
